sentences.sContent: Have you ever observed that birds of a feather flock together? In other words, people who are similar become friends or do things together.
sentences.sContent_eng: Have you ever observed that birds of a feather flock together? In other words, people who are similar become friends or do things together.
sentences.sCn: 你观察过吗“物以类聚，人以群分”？换句话说，性格相似的人总是会成为朋友，或者在一起做事情。

remMethod.val: 和block(n. 块； 阻滞； 一批)一起记

trans.tranOther: if people flock to a place, they go there in large numbers because something interesting or exciting is happening there

trans.tranCn: 群， 群 A <；大量， 众多
trans.tranOther: a group of sheep, goats, or birds
